messages.content: You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing web projects developed using Java and the Spring Boot (Spring MVC / Spring ecosystem) framework. I need to generate an OpenAPI Specification for a web project based on its backend source code. To initiate this process, I'll provide you with the path to a file, your task is to determine whether it is possible for this file to contain definitions of REST API endpoints, rather than just project configuration, feature implementation, database operations, unit tests, or functional tests. You need to follow the structured output, including an indication of whether this file contains API entries and the reasoning behind your judgment.

contains_api_entries.description: Whether it is possible for this file to contain definitions of REST API endpoints.
contains_api_entries.title: Contains Api Entries

message.content: {"contains_api_entries":true,"reason":"The file is located under src/main/java and in a package named controllers.consumer with the class name PayPalController. In a Spring Boot project, a class named *Controller typically defines REST endpoints (annotated with @Controller or @RestController and mapping annotations like @RequestMapping/@GetMapping/@PostMapping). Therefore it is likely to contain API endpoint definitions rather than only configuration or tests."}
